page.title: 09Romiley Forum
page.content: Romiey Forum is a theatre which provides various forms of entertainment,including films,plays,musicals,amateur productions and snooker matches. The Town Hall decides what production is to be shown. More people attend on Friday night than any other night.The Forum holds 490 people for a band concert,250 for a dance and the most it will hold with the stage extended is 414.One full house per production is the norm. Things sometimes go wrong, one funny occasion was when Terry Griffiths was playing snooker.The game was so slow the Lighting Man fell asleep and accidentally knocked the switch for the table light which went off.The best attended productions have been,101 Dalmations,Jungle Book,The Life of Brian and amateur productions.
